documents.document: Did @PopCap bring Seth Rogen on as a consultant for Peggle 2? I feel like every character in this game is intoxicated in some way or form.

@jes_chastain This world sadly drops down into hell a little bit more with every passing year.
I feel like I would've liked #TheBoy more if I hadn't already seen #Housebound beforehand.
The #Bound demo was the shortest demo in the history of demos, but it was sure awesome to play in stereoscopic 3D. 👌#PS4

.@nightschoolers' #Oxenfree just gets better with every playthrough. Breaks my heart that I missed the @LimitedRunGames release TWICE!
Very sad to hear about Rob Stewart. Sharkwater was an excellent documentary & he was a talented filmmaker. Condolences to his family.
I miss the good ol' days when I could ignore The Apprentice and not have to hear about Donald Trump every... single... fucking... day.

"...the company was losing $100,000 a day as customers turned towards online media in recent years." Again... fuck digital. #HMV
Ugh... fuck digital. Blockbuster and now HMV... this seriously blows. 😣 #ThankYouHMV #RIPHMV
.@hmvcanada closing down breaks my heart. The last great store for physical media in Canada. I can't imagine a future without it. 😞
@LimitedRunGames Awesome -- thanks! I didn't know you were selling more today. I assume that's 6pm EST?
Just looked at the prices for #Oxenfree on eBay and it's ridiculous. I'm glad the scalpers were at least lucky with @LimitedRunGames today.
